title: Rams pummel Cardinals; Most Influential NON-QB? Minority coaches & opportunities
itunes:title: Rams pummel Cardinals; Most Influential NON-QB? Minority coaches & opportunities
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson start the show by examining the Los Angeles Rams blowout win over the Arizona Cardinals on Monday Night Football. Then the crew shares their thoughts on who's the most influential NON-QB left in the playoffs and which ex-player without experience would be an effective head coach. They're joined by Scott Pioli and he shares his thoughts on the Rams - Cardinals game and what needs to change for minorities to be given more opportunities as head coaches; and they finish up with Dan Hanzus and he explains why the Rams are #8 in his Power Rankings and why he has Buffalo ranked over Kansas City.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
